name: Mirror Shot
description: You loose a damaging flash of light from your polished body. Make a ranged attack on a creature, dealing 1d10 + MOVE steel damage on a hit. On a hit, the target must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, the target has disadvantage on its next attack roll.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
